resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107727</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107727</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085893</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Keep it short (but not too short)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Halten Sie es kurz (aber nicht zu kurz)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maintenez-le court (mais pas trop court)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mantenha-o curto (mas não demasiado curto)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mantengalo corto (ma non troppo corto)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τον κρατήστε απότομα (αλλά όχι πάρα πολύ απότομα)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Manténgalo corto (pero no demasiado corto)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Shorter paragraphs and pages will help make your writing easier to read on the web, but you don't have to sacrifice important content.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kürzere Paragraphen und Seiten helfen, Ihr 
Schreiben einfacher zu bilden, auf dem Web zu lesen, aber Sie müssen 
nicht wichtigen Inhalt opfern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des paragraphes plus courts et des pages aideront 
à faciliter votre écriture pour lire sur le Web, mais vous ne devez 
pas sacrifier le contenu important.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uns parágrafos mais curtos e as páginas 
ajudarão fazer sua escrita mais fácil de ler no Web, mas você não 
tem que sacrificar o índice importante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I paragrafi più corti e le pagine contribuiranno 
a rendere la vostra scrittura più facile leggere sul Web, ma non 
dovete sacrificare il soddisfare importante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι πιό σύντομες παράγραφοι και οι σελίδες θα 
βοηθήσουν να καταστήσουν το γράψιμό σας ευκολότερο να διαβάσει 
στον Ιστό, αλλά δεν ειναι απαραίτητο να θυσιάσετε το σημαντικό 
περιεχόμενο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Párrafos más cortos y las paginaciones ayudarán
a hacer su escritura más fácil leer en el Web, pero usted no tiene 
que sacrificar el contenido importante.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DAVID WALBERT
FN:DAVID WALBERT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085893</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107727</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
